publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-859 Fergus Ewing: Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association—That the Parliament notes the need for support and information for our country’s veterans; appreciates the considerable efforts of charitable organisations to meet the increasing needs of Gulf War veterans, and further commends the men and women who have banded together to form the Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association to provide support for veterans and families in the Highlands.
S1M-859 Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association (lodged on 16 May 2000) Tommy Sheridan*, Michael Russell*

S1M-859 Fergus Ewing: Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association—That the Parliament notes the need for support and information for our country’s veterans; appreciates the considerable efforts of charitable organisations to meet the increasing needs of Gulf War veterans, and further commends the men and women who have banded together to form the Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association to provide support for veterans and families in the Highlands. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Michael Russell
S1M-859 Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association (lodged on 16 May 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Andrew Wilson*, Shona Robison*
S1M-859 Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association (lodged on 16 May 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-859 Fergus Ewing: Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association—That the Parliament notes the need for support and information for our country’s veterans; appreciates the considerable efforts of charitable organisations to meet the increasing needs of Gulf War veterans, and further commends the men and women who have banded together to form the Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association to provide support for veterans and families in the Highlands. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Michael Russell, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Andrew Wilson, Shona Robison, Mr Kenneth Gibson
S1M-859 Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association (lodged on 16 May 2000) Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Alex Neil*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-859 Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association (lodged on 16 May 2000) Mary Scanlon*, Ben Wallace*

S1M-859 Fergus Ewing: Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association-That the Parliament notes the need for support and information for our country's veterans; appreciates the considerable efforts of charitable organisations to meet the increasing needs of Gulf War veterans, and further commends the men and women who have banded together to form the Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association to provide support for veterans and families in the Highlands. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Michael Russell, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Andrew Wilson, Shona Robison, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Alex Neil, Christine Grahame, Mary Scanlon, Ben Wallace

S1M-859 Fergus Ewing: Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association-That the Parliament notes the need for support and information for our country's veterans; appreciates the considerable efforts of charitable organisations to meet the increasing needs of Gulf War veterans, and further commends the men and women who have banded together to form the Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association to provide support for veterans and families in the Highlands. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Michael Russell, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Andrew Wilson, Shona Robison, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Alex Neil, Christine Grahame, Mary Scanlon, Ben Wallace
S1M-859 Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association (lodged on 16 May 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*

S1M-859 Fergus Ewing: Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association—That the Parliament notes the need for support and information for our country’s veterans; appreciates the considerable efforts of charitable organisations to meet the increasing needs of Gulf War veterans, and further commends the men and women who have banded together to form the Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association to provide support for veterans and families in the Highlands. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Michael Russell, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Andrew Wilson, Shona Robison, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Alex Neil, Christine Grahame, Mary Scanlon, Ben Wallace, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Maureen Macmillan*

S1M-859 Fergus Ewing: Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association—That the Parliament notes the need for support and information for our country’s veterans; appreciates the considerable efforts of charitable organisations to meet the increasing needs of Gulf War veterans, and further commends the men and women who have banded together to form the Scottish Highlands Branch of the National Gulf Veterans and Families Association to provide support for veterans and families in the Highlands.
